history.content: You can find some helpful links on this page - I recommend scrolling down past the gold box. Please note that as of today, Lydia Raya is out of the office for medical leave. Other advisors should be able to help you.

I saw that Intended CS majors are supposed to use CalCentral in order to schedule advising appointments, however, whenever I try and schedule an appointment, Calcentral says that "The program or advisor selected is “inactive,” meaning it is not set up in this system. Please contact the department directly to make an appointment." Is there any way to get around this, or to schedule an appointment with an advisor?

Thanks!
history.subject: How can Intended CS Majors make Advising Appointments?

history.content:
